Title: Links: SSL verification vulnerability
Synopsis:
An error in the verification of SSL certificates in Links might
    enable remote attackers to conduct man-in-the-middle attacks.

Background.Text: Links is a fast lightweight text and graphic web-browser.

Description.Text: A SSL verification vulnerability and two unspecified vulnerabilities have been discovered in Links. Please review the Secunia Advisory referenced below for details.

Impact.Text: An attacker might conduct man-in-the-middle attacks. The unspecified errors could allow for out-of-bounds reads and writes.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All Links users should upgrade to the latest version:
